name: Mask Mandate
description:
Enjoy this silly 2D puzzle game for Global Game Jam 2022 brought to you by memeHacker and mewissa!

You and your (uh, really close friend) must navigate through totally normal situations, but you only have one mask. Don't get caught by the virus!

Authors
  • memeHacker: Unity developer, art and design
  • mewissa: Production, project management, voice over and sound design
Jam Info

Theme: Duality
Diversifiers:

  • Don’t go alone, take THIS (Sponsored by Unity)
  • Sustainable
  • Stick Together
Controls
  • ^ button: Move the active character
  • Swap Active Player: Swap between active characters to move
  • Swap Mask: Give the mask to the other character - only available at the start and swap zone!
